name: Small hair bows *pink*
description:
One pair of small patterned hair bows on kirby grips.

I'm not a very girlie girl and always find myself wearing black and struggling to add accessories; hence my day to day outfits tend to be quite bland and subsequently a bit boring. In an attempt to add a little something to my wardrobe, I started creating different hair pieces. 
Each piece is made by hand and sewn with love.

Don't hesitate to message me with any questions or customisations.
Please note: due to the handmade nature of the product, each individual bow may vary slightly.

name: Baby bird nursery mobile
description:
While decorating my daughters nursery, I struggled to find a mobile that not only matched the colour scheme I'd chosen but also the theme of the room. So I created this lovely mobile that my daughter now adores. 

The mobile consists of 5 handmade tiered birds with bells and a ruffled hanging piece. 
The fabric choices are completely customisable. Plain coloured fabrics in all colours available too. 
If interested in purchasing the mobile, please message me and I'll send you the colour swatch choices.
When purchasing please leave fabric choices in the comments box. Up to 5 fabric choices may be selected.
Supplied ready to hang.

As the mobile is made to order please allow a week from purchase for creation plus delivery.
Any questions or special requests don't hesitate to message me and I will try to oblige you.

WARNING: This is not a toy and should be hung out of reach of children. For decoration purposes only.
